author: Maxwell Britten
description: Heavy doses of Creole-style bitters and orange bitters work with dry vermouth to balance this drink's rich sweet vermouth base. A great aperitivo.
name: Old Hickory (Britten's recipe)
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
